name: water-pulse
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
short_effect: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user attacks the foe with a pulsing blast of water. It may also confuse the foe.
flavor_text.platinum: The user attacks the foe with a pulsing blast of water. It may also confuse the foe.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The user attacks the foe with a pulsing blast of water. It may also confuse the foe.
